name: Quantum Travel
description:
NOW WITH (some) AUDIO!

My first game development, so not much to look at.

Has a main menu, tutorial and 3 levels. I'm unlikely to add anything more to this particular game, but may bring the ideas forward in the future.

A top down action game where the player can dash forward with "unspecified-time-powers". This is something I may come back to at a later point, but mostly was an excercise for me to learn the basics of Godot and make a brief game.
